sources.title: AiDub: AI Video Translator - Apps on Google Play
sources.snippet: AiDub is an AI video dubbing and translator app that helps you translate videos, dub videos, and generate AI voiceovers in more than 40 languages. This AI-powered dubbing tool lets you translate audio, add voice dubbing, and create lip-synced video translations for social media or personal content.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Apps AiDub (Android) – AI video translator/dubber app for 40+ languages. Google Play
